data.title: Best Movies Like Iron Sky
data.meta_description: Movies Similar to Iron Sky: Iron Sky: The Coming Race (2019), Spaceballs (1987), Mars Attacks! (1996), Independence Day (1996), Starship Troopers (1997), Galaxy Quest (1999), The 25th Reich (2012), Independence Day: Resurgence (2016), Men in Black 3 (2012), Starship Troopers 3: Marauder (2008)
